main event: Two USAF pilots observed a bright white object in Stuttgart, Germany, on January 26, 1953.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 1.5 minutes,The object appeared to move with extreme speed and made quick turns,The pilots reported that the object was flying at the same altitude as their aircraft,Weather conditions were clear during the observation,There was a conclusion drawn that the object might be Venus or Deneb.
witness description: USAF pilots rated as exceptionally reliable
